transcript:
[10:30] Child: I drew a picture of our house.  
[10:32] Caregiver: You used so many colors. I like how you added the garden.  
[10:35] Child: The flowers are for you.  
[10:37] Caregiver: That is very thoughtful. Let us hang it on the fridge.  
[10:40] Child: Can we draw more later.  
[10:42] Caregiver: Yes. After lunch we will use the big paper and crayons.
justification: The caregiver shows a positive and supportive attitude towards the child's artwork. They acknowledge the effort put into it and make plans to engage in similar activities later.
